overview: About to turn thirty years old, Román has decided to change his life, buy a boat and sail forever with or without his girlfriend. He has a plan to make a lot of money, as it happened a few years ago without any success. But things will change soon when the reunion with his old friend Martín shakes his plans.

production_companies.name: Sociedad de Estudio y Desarrollo Audiovisual S.L.

title: A tiro limpio
